text: Tylodina perversa, common names the "yellow tylodina" or "yellow umbrella slug", is a species of sea snail or false limpet, a marine opisthobranch gastropod mollusk in the family Tylodinidae. This opisthobranch has a limpet- like shell which is composed primarily of protein, not calcium carbonate. ==Distribution== This species of false limpet occurs in the northeastern Atlantic including the British Isles and the Mediterranean Sea. ==Ecology== T. perversa feeds on the sponge species Aplysina aerophoba. == References == * Sea Slug Forum info ==External links== * Category:Tylodinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1791
title: Tylodina perversa
